item.title: SML Mahindra Ltd Hits Intraday High with 8.53% Surge on 10 Feb 2026
item.description: SML Mahindra Ltd recorded a robust intraday performance on 10 Feb 2026, surging to a day’s high of Rs 4,278.75, marking an 8.85% increase. The stock outperformed its sector and broader market indices, reflecting heightened trading activity and strong momentum within the automobile segment. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: JSW Steel Ltd. Stock Hits All-Time High, Marking a Significant Milestone
item.description: JSW Steel Ltd., a leading player in the ferrous metals industry, has reached an all-time high in its stock price, underscoring a period of robust performance and sustained growth. The stock’s recent surge reflects a culmination of consistent gains and strong market positioning within its sector. Time: 12 minutes ago
